name: Lockout Gardna
desc: When an opponent’s monster declares an attack: You can Special Summon this card from your hand in Attack Position, and if you do, it cannot be destroyed by battle during this turn. When a monster effect is activated on your opponent's field that targets exactly 1 Cyberse monster you control (Quick Effect): You can activate this effect; both that Cyberse monster you control and that opponent’s monster have their effects negated (if any) until the end of the turn.
